reflowSkin.slogan: JavaFX Console for IBM Websphere MQ
reflowSkin.bottomDescription: MQConsole is a small JavaFX2 utility application which allows you to interact with an IBM Websphere MQ messaging broker. From a main window with the list of available queues you can: * List the messages in a queue * View a especific message details * Send a new message to a queue and wait for a response * Listen to new messages arriving at a queue and display them automatically. No need to have administrative credentials, just configure the hostname where the broker is in, the channel and the name of the queue manager.
